Title: Authorizes the commissioner of health to conduct a study and issue a report examining unmet health and resource needs facing women with polycystic ovarian syndrome in New York state
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to conduct a study and issue a report examining unmet health and resource needs facing women with polycystic ovarian syndrome in New York and the impact of limited service and resources for women to obtain accurate, non-coercive health care information and timely access to a comprehensive range of reproductive and sexual health care services.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of health to conduct a study and issue a report examining unmet health and resource needs facing women with polycystic ovarian syndrome in New York state and the impact of limited service centers and resources for women to obtain accurate, non-coercive health care information and timely access to a comprehensive range of reproductive and sexual health care services
